Subject: ARC mime type
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=241416423

This isn't really about heritrix but it seemed like a good place to
ask the question: Is there a mime type for ARC files? I can't find one
referenced in the ARC spec or registered with IANA.

I understand that the WARC mime type will be registered as
application/warc. Maybe we could just use application/arc since IANA
doesn't have one by that name?

thanks,
Andrea
